author: trapanator
message: In the second screenshot, how can your kid go back to the menu with keyboard?

replies.author: Aurélien
replies.message: using the left and right arrow changes the focused button (the blue one). You press left to reach the "home" button, then press space.

author: Bart Cerneels
message: Wow, that looks really good. Nice work.

author: Matthias
message: I hear "kid" and "focused button". It doesn't go together in my head.

replies.author: Aurélien
replies.message: I see what you mean, but in this case you can replace "focused" with "blue". That makes more sense for a child.

author: Kyriakos Brastianos
message: Aurélien that is the most interesting approach i have seen lately, but out of curiosity why wasn't these achievable with something like plasma media center?

replies.author: Aurélien
replies.message: It is indeed similar to Plasma Media Center, but it is much simpler because it only does video. Plasma Media Center was also very much geared toward touchscreens in the beginning, making it a bad candidate for a laptop setup. It has changed since then though, so maybe in the future I'll switch to Plasma Media Center.
